parameters.name: weaviate_version
parameters.description: Select the Weaviate version to use.

options.name: v1.34.0
options.description: Latest stable release with all features

options.name: v1.30.0
options.description: Runtime config management, Dynamic user management, Dynamic RAG model selection

parameters.name: weaviate_volume
parameters.description: How should Weaviate's data be persisted?

options.name: named-volume
options.description: Docker will create a named volume called weaviate_data.

options.name: host-binding
options.description: Docker will mount ./weaviate_data on the host to the container.

options.name: no-volume
options.description: Not recommended: Data may be lost on container restart.

options.name: text2vec-transformers
options.description: Local, high-accuracy model. Requires GPUs to run efficiently.

options.name: text2vec-ollama
options.description: Uses a local Ollama container for embeddings.

options.name: img2vec-neural-pytorch
options.description: Pytorch-based ResNet50 model. Runs on CPU or CUDA-GPU.

options.name: img2vec-neural-keras
options.description: Keras-based ResNet50 model. Restricted to amd64 and CPU.

options.name: generative-ollama
options.description: Uses a local Ollama container for generative AI.

parameters.name: additional_modules
parameters.description: Enable additional modules for backups, spell checking, etc.

options.name: backup-s3
options.description: Back up and restore Weaviate to an S3 bucket.

options.name: reranker-transformers
options.description: Rerank search results using a local transformers model.

options.name: qna-transformers
options.description: Answer extraction from documents, based on a question.

options.name: ner-transformers
options.description: Extract named entities from your text objects.

options.name: sum-transformers
options.description: Summarize text snippets from your search results.

options.name: text-spellcheck
options.description: Suggest or auto-fix misspelled queries.

options.name: ref2vec-centroid
options.description: Vectorize a class with the average vectors of a cross-referenced class.

parameters.name: transformers_model
parameters.description: Select the specific model for the text2vec-transformers module.

options.name: sentence-transformers-multi-qa-MiniLM-L6-cos-v1
options.description: Recommended for semantic search.

options.name: sentence-transformers-all-MiniLM-L12-v2
options.description: A good all-purpose model.

options.name: sentence-transformers-paraphrase-multilingual-MiniLM-L12-v2
options.description: Recommended for multilingual use cases.

parameters.name: reranker_transformers_model
parameters.description: Select the model for the reranker-transformers module.

options.name: cross-encoder-ms-marco-MiniLM-L-6-v2
options.description: Trained on MS Marco Passage Ranking task.

options.name: cross-encoder-ms-marco-TinyBERT-L-2-v2
options.description: A smaller, faster model for passage ranking.

parameters.name: qna_model
parameters.description: Select the model for the qna-transformers module.

options.name: distilbert-base-uncased-distilled-squad
options.description: English, uncased model.

options.name: bert-large-uncased-whole-word-masking-finetuned-squad
options.description: English, uncased, whole-word masking.

parameters.name: ner_model
parameters.description: Select the model for the ner-transformers module.

options.name: dbmdz-bert-large-cased-finetuned-conll03-english
options.description: English model.

options.name: dslim-bert-base-NER
options.description: English model.

parameters.name: sum_model
parameters.description: Select the model for the sum-transformers module.

options.name: facebook-bart-large-cnn-1.0.0
options.description: CNN summarization model.
